translation:
Friend Inácio

I have now obtained the adjoining permit and with it I sent the said gentleman to our friend Abreu, and that he passes by here so that I can write. When Inocêncio or the carts return, I will say what occurs about the flours.

Your sincere friend and thank you Almeida 
Piratini, November 7, 1838.
